snippet: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles announced on Wednesday that four patients had contracted a deadly, drug-resistant infection linked to a hard-to-clean medical device.
abstract: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles announces four patients have contracted a deadly, drug-resistant infection linked to a hard-to-clean medical device known as a duodenoscope.
lead_paragraph: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles announced on Wednesday that four patients had contracted a deadly, drug-resistant infection linked to a hard-to-clean medical device.

headline.main: California: More Drug-Resistant Cases Are Linked to Medical Device
headline.print_headline: California: More Drug-Resistant Cases Are Linked to Medical Device
